pr_title: Add an option to specify a Span Kind via the WithSpan annotation.

timeline.message: Add an option to specify a Span Kind via the annotation.
exclude grpc-context from the annotation dependencies.

timeline.bodyText: @bogdandrutu @carlosalberto any issues with this late-breaking change to minimize the dependencies of the annotations module?
timeline.author: jkwatson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@ description = 'OpenTelemetry Contrib Auto Annotations'
 ext.moduleName = "io.opentelemetry.contrib.auto.annotations"
 
 dependencies {
-    implementation project(':opentelemetry-api')
+    implementation project(':opentelemetry-api') exclude group: 'io.grpc', module: 'grpc-context'
